MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY15 postcode area of Montgomery affecting properties in Village Green, Hawthorn Drive, Cefn Y Coed and surrounding area . We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at  8:11am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a grounded overhead line near Court Calmore. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible and we expect the power to be restored by in stages by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20am on 5th November 2020.
